name: Not Ikaruga
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 73. At first, I was terribly short on time so this was very unfinished, but I got the bare minimum for a game anyway.

UPDATE (2/8/2021): Since we're allowed to update our game post-submission, I added a lot more polish and replayability to the game.

Inspired by Ikaruga, where you switch between the colors of Black and White.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • J to shoot
  • K to switch between Blue and Red
  • SPACE to fire a giant laser beam, when meter is full

When you are blue, you cannot get hit by Blue bullets, and you can hit blue enemies. Vice versa for red.
